title: Elektra, Vol. 4: Frenzy
description: The beautiful but deadly assassin is hired to eliminate the leader of a violent guerilla movement in Southeast Asia, but will Elektra's conscience allow her to fulfill the contract when she learns the insane guerilla leader is just an 8-year-old boy hailed as a prophet by his followers? Collects Elektra #29-34.
author: Robert Rodi
